- EYELETS: Two small BLACK metal eyelets on the waistband (dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver).
- WAISTBAND: Clean, elastic waistband with subtle Ron Dorff branding.

- Material: 95% cotton, 5% elasthanne - soft, stretchy fabric with slight sheen.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting with even, diffused illumination. Show fabric texture and construction details clearly.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface. Clean, seamless backdrop.
